yarrawater 0.0.0.9000

water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action.

yarra_wq_clean.Rd

A cleaned dataset used by the Shiny app.

A dataset of water quality observations from the Yarra River, comparing pre-pandemic (1990s) and recent decades (2020s).

Usage

yarra_wq_clean

yarra_wq_clean

Format

A data frame with 888 rows and 14 variables:

Site ID

Year of record

industry

Industry factor

revenue

Revenue (BRL)

net_profit

Net profit (BRL)

A data frame with 888 rows and 14 variables:

Datetime

Date and time of water sampling.

Parameter

Type of measurement ("pH", "Turbidity", "Salinity as EC@25").

Value

Measured numeric value of the parameter.

Unit

Measurement unit, e.g., NTU or mg/L.

Site

Sampling location.

Source

Data source, e.g., EPA Victoria.

Source

Bureau van Dijk Osiris (2018–2021), cleaned in data-raw/cleaned_data.R

Environment Protection Authority Victoria, cleaned in data-raw/cleaned_data.R
